steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Put(number_in_box(3), into_box(9)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(3), number_in_box(3), put_result_into_box(9)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(7), 2), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 2), increase(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(7), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 2), number_in_box(8)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(4)),
Put(number_in_box(5), into_box(1)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(7), 1), increase(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(7), 1), increase(2)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 9?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在9号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Put ( number in box 3 ) into box 9
Multiply: ( number in box 3 ) * ( number in box 3 ), put result into box 9.
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 7 greater than ( number in box 5 )

Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 8 )
Put ( number in box 5 ) into box 1
Change Instruction 7: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
